channel.title: Changing the color of items?
channel.description: Well, is it possible? If it is, I'd really know how to change the color of a Dragon Chainbody, or some Dragon weapons or perhaps Barrows or an Abyssal Whip. Would appreciate a post or 5 ASAP, thanks!

item.title: Changing the color of items?
item.dc:creator: @Heroic Heroic
item.description:
@Heroic wrote:

No, you can not change the color of items. unless you would like to start from scratch making the images, interfaces, items, ect.

Read full topic
